name: technician

effect.black-white: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.black-2-white-2: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.black-white: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
